Package com.cs_group.managers

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs_group.managers.FileManager
  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: com.cs_group.managers.FileManager Description: Manager class that handles the entire File portion of the backend File i/o for Users, File i/o for GameLists Planned on Singleton Design Pattern, but unsure how in Java

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileManager()
      constructor: com.cs_group.managers.FileManager() Upon creation, loads all games from the game file into memory

      • isRegisteredUser

        public boolean isRegisteredUser​(User insertUser)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method: isRegisteredUser: Description: Upon user creation, the user is stored in the login file. This method checks to ensure no duplicate user is created
        Parameters:
        insertUser - : com.cs_group.objects.User to check duplicates
        Returns:
        returns TRUE if the user is found within the file, returns FALSE otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

      • gamesSearchResult

        public GameList gamesSearchResult​(Game game)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        method: gamesSearchResult() method that handles game searching. Creates a Gamelist of all the games that match the serach results, then returns it. Searching is done through compareNames() method from com.cs_group.objects.Game class
        Parameters:
        game - A game that contains the string from the user's search as the game title to compare
        Returns:
        Gamelist that holds all games with the search string somewhere in the game
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

      • loadUser

        public void loadUser​(User user)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        method: loadUser assumes that multiple gamelists are not implemented. Fetches the user file to get each jsonObject.get(). Each is stored into gamelist(0)
        Parameters:
        user - com.cs_group.objects.User to load the gamelist into
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
